name: 劇本分析
restrict: ◎必須先修過【PAU0046  劇本導讀】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: Help students acquire abilities using methods and tools to analyze the scripts.
Help students learn how to analyze and comprehend natures and special qualities in a variety of script genres, and inspire the students further to present and express by exploring more possibilities.
prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【PAU0046  Guided Reading of Plays】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
